a.span: Blackfoot Charter Community Learning Center Home Page

span.span: The mission of the Blackfoot Charter Community Learning Center is to know each student well enough to challenge and meet their individual academic and developmental needs. This is accomplished through a goal-driven environment that utilizes small groups, interactive technology, and brain based learning. These are supported by a high level of teacher collaboration and professional development.

font.span: We are a free public school.
We are a STEAM school (science, technology, engineering, art, and math).

span.span: We have small class sizes to ensure more individualized and focused attention.
Each classroom uses cutting edge SmartBoard Technology.
We incorporate a 4 day school week so teachers can use Fridays to collaborate and plan lessons, as well as participate in professional development.
We have a dedicated transportation department that offers students free bussing.
School Hours: Monday thru Thursday 8:30 a.m. to 3:15 p.m.

It is the policy of BCCLC not to discriminate on the basis of sex, race, color, national origin, religion, disabilities, or any other legally protected class(es) as defined by applicable state and federal law, in its education programs, activities, admissions, access, treatment, or employment practices.
